term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - retardation factor, R, in column chromatography
term.title: retardation factor

item.text: The fraction of the sample component in the mobile phase at equilibrium; it is related to the retention factor and other fundamental chromatography terms:

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 819. 'Nomenclature for chromatography (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 843 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365040819)
